item.description: We're going to play some golf in between partying at Dave AKA Grasshopper’s house. He lives near Rockledge and has invited us to stop by 11 a.m. or after for Early Happy Hour. At 2 p.m., we play nine holes at Rockledge, then return to Dave’s for Happy Hour Part 2. Join us for all or any part of the day. Newcomers welcome! Dave's address: 162 Selden Hill Drive, West Hartford.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Dave's or outside the pro shop at Rockledge.
item.name: Memorial Day Golf Sandwich - Dave's / Rockledge / Dave's
